articles.title: Heart-healthy diets: Where keto, paleo and Mediterranean rank, based on science - NBC News
articles.description: What is the healthiest diet for the heart? The American Heart Association ranks popular diets for the first time based on scientific guidelines.
articles.content: Some of the most popular diet plans may help with weight loss, which can lower the risk of heart disease. But an eating plan that includes a lot of unhealthy oils and saturated fats can raise the ris… [+4708 chars]

articles.title: US claims Sudan too dangerous to evacuate Americans while rest of the world safely removes their citizens - Fox News
articles.description: The U.S. does not have a plan to evacuate its estimated 16,000 Americans still residing in Sudan, despite undergoing a special military evacuation for its diplomatic staff.
articles.content:
The U.S. has extracted its diplomatic staff from Sudan, as security conditions in the country worsened late last week, but the evacuation left thousands of Americans behind.
